name: Francesco Trovò
content: Francesco Trovo' Francesco Trovò Ph.D. Short bio Academic career I received my Ph.D. in Information Technology at Politecnico di Milano, Italy, in 2015. I graduated in Mathematical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano, Italy, in 2011. In the same year, I also achieved my Master of Science in machine learning and data mining at Aalto University, Helsinki, Finland. Currently, I am an Assistant Professor with the Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria, Politecnico di Milano in the Artificial Intelligence and Robotic Laboratory (AIRLab). Research interests My research interests focus are: - Learning in Microeconomic environments - Mathematical and statisticalal modeling - Intelligent systems At the moment I am focused on the following line: online learning for microeconomic problems.
